p:
United States of America Territory of Washington County of Spokane} In Justice's Court before J.J.L. Paul J.P.
The City of Spokane Falls vs. Frankie Sutsinger deft. To the city marshall of Spokane Falls or any Constable and the keeper of the County hail of said County. Whereas, at the Justices court, hold at my office in the City of Spokane Falls in said county and Territory for an trial of Frankie Futsinger for the offense thereinafter stated, the said Frankie Sutsinger was convicted on trial (defending to plead) on the testimony of witnesses under aoth for the offense of wilfully unlawfully and maliciously keep- ing a house, within the city limits, of the city of Spokane Falls, in which other persons, smoke or inhale opium, contrary to the provisions and in violation of an ordinance of said city entitled an ordinance prohibiting the smoking or inhaling of opium passed by the city council Sep- tember 9th 1885, and upon said testimony the said court did adjudge and determine that the said Frankie Sutsinger should pay a fine of Twenty five dollars, and the costs of said sentence, amounting to Twenty nine and 65/100 dollars, making a total of Fifty Four and 65/100 dollars, and said Frankie Sut- singer having failed to pay said fine and costs, you the said marshall or constable are commanded in the name of the United States forthwith to convey the said Frankie Sutsinger to the keeper of the county jail at Cheney, said county and territory, and you the said keeper are hereby commanded to receive the said Frankir Sutsinger into your cus- tody, in said jail, snf be there safely keep, until she shall then be discharged, by due course of law. Dated this 19th day of December 1885 J.J.L. Paul Justice of the Peace
The City of Spokane Falls Frankie Sutsinger Committment
